audioText: La terre fertile de cette région permet aux agriculteurs de cultiver des légumes biologiques de haute qualité.
question: What advantage does this region offer to farmers?
options: Fertile soil allows them to grow high-quality organic vegetables.
Low prices make farming more profitable.
The climate is perfect for all types of crops.
explanation: The speaker explains 'La terre fertile de cette région permet aux agriculteurs de cultiver des légumes biologiques de haute qualité' - The fertile soil of this region allows farmers to grow high-quality organic vegetables. 'Terre' here refers to soil/land quality for agriculture.
